column1: The Pit Room////We did a carry for the Superbowl for me and my girlfriend from the Pit.  The lady Adrienne was very helpful explaining the menu at what were their  specialties.  I ordered 1 lb of rips
column3: a pint of Mac N Cheese
column5: not on cob.  She said it was of season...which is bs.  I went to pick the order total was $43 with tax and I gave a $4 tip.
